TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AutomationInteropProvider extends System.Object
public ref class AutomationInteropProvider abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides support for communication between UI Automation providers and UI Automation client applications.

Contains a value that, when returned as the first element of the array passed by the UI Automation provider to , indicates that the ID is partial and should be appended to the ID provided by the base provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個欄位通常用於實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>在片段中不會直接裝載在視窗中的項目。
## Examples 下列範例會實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>清單項目。
[!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#101)]

Docs.summary: Returns a UI Automation provider that represents the specified window.
Docs.returns: The raw element provider for the specified window.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的介面只會傳回給[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。 嘗試在介面上呼叫方法會引發例外狀況。

Docs.summary: Specifies the maximum number of events to send before batching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會決定是否通知提供個別的事件這類<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildAdded>或的大量事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkAdded>。

Docs.summary: The maximum number of events to send before batching for items in containers.

Public Shared Sub RaiseAutomationEvent (eventId As AutomationEvent, provider As IRawElementProviderSimple, e As AutomationEventArgs)

public: static void RaiseAutomationEvent(System::Windows::Automation::AutomationEvent ^ eventId, System::Windows::Automation::Provider::IRawElementProviderSimple ^ provider, System::Windows::Automation::AutomationEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.param: The element associated with the event.
Docs.summary: Raises a pattern event or a custom event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 只要模式實作，應該不會引發模式事件。 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent>應該引發時叫用控制項時，透過<xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A>或透過滑鼠或鍵盤輸入。 如此一來，用戶端可以收到相關通知的系統事件。

Docs.param: The element associated with the event.
Docs.summary: Raises an event when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 變更樹狀結構中的範例是要加入的子項目或從清單方塊中，移除或正在展開或摺疊樹狀結構檢視中。
其中一個元素，或其容器的執行階段識別項的子元素中移除時，會傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventArgs>建構函式。 在目前版本中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]，不過，沒有簡單的方法提供者的執行個體可以探索其執行階段識別項。 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>方法通常會傳回陣列，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.AppendRuntimeId>，識別常數，它會指示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]系統建立控制項的每個執行個體的唯一識別碼。 所提供的原始值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>不應在事件中，因為它是無意義的用戶端，且不能用來識別特定的執行個體。
由於這項限制之類型的事件<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildAdded>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildRemoved>不是非常有用。 或者，一律使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkAdded>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkRemoved>，傳遞的執行階段識別項為 0。 您無法使用`null`，因為這會引發例外狀況。 用戶端將會收到通知已經在容器中進行變更 (由`sender`參數傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventHandler>)，且已加入或移除哪些子系的特定通知不。
## Examples 下列範例顯示如何引發的事件子系加入時，或從自訂清單方塊中移除。
[!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

Docs.param: The UI Automation provider for the element.
Docs.summary: Returns the UI automation provider for an element in response to a message.
Docs.returns: A pointer to data that should be assigned to before passing the message to the base window procedure.

Docs.summary: Contains a value used in the member of a message, indicating that the server should return a reference to the root raw element provider.
